outputs.output_descr: The project is aiming at enhancing the Socio-economic reintegration of high risk youths operating informal transport services (motorcycle) and the promotion of mechanism for resolving conflict  among motorcycle riders, the community and the Police. In addition, motorcyclist will receive training on highway Code, and other safety measures, compliance with rules and laws while riding thereby promoting human safety and live.

project_title: Supporting Peaceful Rentegration of High Risk Youths
